fry.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil
fry.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Fry the potatoes, covered, for about 20 minutes.
fry.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to kill someone in an electric chair, or to be killed in an electric chair, as a punishment
Fry belongs to a group of verbs where the same noun can be the subject of the verb or its object
In this sentence, ‘some fish’ is the object of fry
In this sentence, ‘some fish’ is the subject of fry
fry.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a long thin piece of potato that has been cooked in fat
